title: AI-Enhanced OER Sustainability Design Practical Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Open Educational Resources (OER) Basic Concepts and Basic Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: A course focused on enhancing OER creation and management capabilities using AI tools in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply an OER design framework that reflects five sustainability dimensions (social, economic, environmental, educational, and technological).
Learners can produce multilingual OER content with over 40% reduced development time compared to traditional methods using AI tools.
Learners can integrate inclusive design elements into OER to enhance learner engagement by 20%.
Learners can design a scalable OER operational system aligned with the Education 5.0 vision.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
